Name: Dusty Boots
Description: Every time you move this turn, move to any space.

Name: Plastic Trash Bag
Description: Trash any number of cards from your deck. Shuffle your deck.

Name: Rusty Nail
Description: Steal an opponent's Equipment card, or a face-up Action.

Name: Rusty Shovel
Description: Every Dig you play this turn is a Dig 3.

Name: Periscope
Description: Choose an opponent. They must show you all Artifacts in their possession.

Name: Map
Description: Choose any 3 spaces. Look at all of the Landscape cards in those spaces, and return them.

Name: Auditor's Log
Description: Look at every committed contract card.

Name: Antique Knife
Description: Steal an opponent's Equipment card, or a face-up Action.

Name: Ancient Axe
Description: Each opponent must trash one card from their hand.

Name: Cursed Statue
Description: Place face-up on one of the Mission cards. The rewards on that Mission are now -$4k

Name: Ornate Chalice
Description: This turn, every time an opponent reveals a Turn card, you decide which direction they face.

Name: Gold Watch
Description: After your turn, draw back up to 5 cards, prepare as many cards as you want, and resolve immediately.

Name: Rare Geode
Description: Search the Artifact deck, and keep 1. Shuffle the Artifact deck.

Name: Uncut Gem
Description: Return your committed contract card to your hand. You may play a different one.
